data.description:
From the December 2025 codebase audit, these stale comments were identified:

1. cortical/got/versioned_store.py:354 - TODO about checksums
2. cortical/got/api.py:1680 - HACK comment  
3. scripts/got_utils.py:1445 - TODO placeholder
4. Plus 2 other TODO/HACK comments found during audit

Action needed:
- Review each comment to determine if still relevant
- Remove comments that are no longer valid
- Update comments that need correction
- Create follow-up tasks if TODOs need implementation

This was deferred from Stage 4 of the codebase cleanup audit.
data.title: Investigate and clean up stale TODO/HACK comments
